page.title: 01Cleve Park : New School.
page.content:
{ LOCAL SCHOOLS TO MERGER !}
One of the changes in Sidcup has been the final decision that the two schools, Parklands School for boys and Sidcup School for girls are joining up to make one mixed school, called { {Cleve Park}. It has been decided that there is going to be a Headmistress.The mix is going to be a gradual one.The new school will be on the{Parklands School {site,}the girls moving there.On the Sidcup Girls School site the huts will be demolished and Birkbeck Primary School will have the whole of the main building to themselves.The mobile classrooms at the rear of the primary school may be demolished to make way for a{new housing estate ?}
